page.title: 12EDUCATION SCHOOLS SCRAPTOFT
page.content: In the district there are five state primary schools for children aged 5-11.The two city schools also have a nursery for 3-5 year olds.At 10 or 11 children transfer to comprehensive schools in the city or county.Our school,Willowbrook is just inside the city boundary. It is nearly 30 years old.This is what we do at school.Every morning we play in the playground until the whistle goes,then we line up outside our classroom.When our teacher lets us in,we hang our coats in the cloakroom.I wish we could take our things in our room so no one could get them.While the teacher does the register,we do our spellings and tables.Then we go to assembly where the headmaster tells us a story and we sing hymns and say our prayers.
